content: Tokyo taught me discipline, but NYC is where I'll find my purpose. From bullet trains to the subway, the transition is real. Nervous but I'm ready to make my mark in tech. Time to code my way into this city's heartbeat.

At 22, I'm diving into AI and blockchain. My dApp's taking shape, but it's more than just code—it's about reshaping trust and security in digital assets. Grateful for the journey and the community that's shaping my path.
